frontmatter.title: Get the akv2k8s Controller Log
frontmatter.description: How to access the Controller log and specify log level

children.value: To set log-level for Controller, pass inn environment variable
The Controller uses Logrus for logging, supporting seven log levels:
- Trace, Debug, Info, Warning, Error, Fatal and Panic. Default log level is
